overview.title: The Agreement
overview.warningContent: By using OPTIMO, you're agreeing to everything below. If you don't agree, don't use it. Simple as that.
overview.content:
These Terms control your relationship with OPTIMO Workforce's AI-powered scheduling platform ("Services") provided by OPTIMO Workforce, Inc. ("we," "us," "our").

Using our Services = accepting these Terms. Don't like them? Don't use OPTIMO. We won't take it personally.

This applies to everyone—restaurant owners saving money, managers getting their life back, staff getting fair schedules, and anyone else using our platform.

definitions.title: What We Mean When We Say
definitions.accountDefinition: Your OPTIMO login and everything connected to it.
definitions.contentDefinition: Any stuff you upload, create, or share—data, photos, schedules, whatever.
definitions.customerDataDefinition: All the info you and your team put into OPTIMO. It's yours, we just store it.

accountRegistration.title: Your Account Rules
accountRegistration.accountCreationContent: Real info only—no fake names or bogus emails. Must be 18+ (we check). One account per person/business. Choose a password you won't share with your ex.
accountRegistration.accountSecurityContent: Your account = your responsibility. Someone hacks you? Tell us ASAP. Use a strong password (not 'password123'). Turn on 2FA or we'll judge you.

serviceDescription.title: What You're Getting
serviceDescription.serviceOverviewContent: AI that schedules better than any human. Crystal ball for predicting busy times. Seamless hookup to your POS. Works on anything with internet.
serviceDescription.serviceAvailabilityContent: We aim for 99.9% uptime (pretty damn good). Scheduled maintenance = we warn you. Emergency fixes = no warning (sorry). Different countries might have different features.

subscriptionBilling.title: Money Talk
subscriptionBilling.subscriptionPlansContent: Different plans for different needs. Pay per location and user count. Big company? Let's talk custom pricing. Plus tax (the government's cut).
subscriptionBilling.billingPaymentContent: We bill monthly or yearly (your choice). Pay when we invoice or get cut off. Credit cards, ACH, whatever works. Late = service stops until you pay.

dataPrivacy.title: Your Data, Your Rules
dataPrivacy.dataCollectionContent: See our Privacy Policy for the full scoop. Your data stays yours, period. We use it only to make the service work. We don't sell it—that's gross.
dataPrivacy.dataSecurityContent: Bank-level encryption on everything. Regular security tests by pros. SOC 2 certified (the real deal). Your data is safer than your secret recipes.

intellectualProperty.title: Who Owns What
intellectualProperty.ourIPContent: The platform, AI, and secret sauce = ours. Our logo and brand = also ours. Don't copy, hack, or reverse engineer. Your ideas might become features (thanks!).
intellectualProperty.yourContentContent: Your data stays yours forever. We need permission to use it (just to run the service). Make sure you own what you upload. Don't upload your competitor's data.

prohibitedUses.title: Don't Be That Person
prohibitedUses.prohibitedActivitiesContent: No illegal stuff—we'll report you. No hacking or breaking things. No DDoS attacks or server overloads. No viruses, malware, or digital nasties.
prohibitedUses.contentRestrictionsContent: No illegal or abusive content. No stealing others' work. No spam—nobody likes spam. No violating anyone's privacy.

warranties.title: What We Promise (And Don't)
warranties.limitedWarrantyContent: Service works as advertised (mostly). We own the rights to provide it. Problems? We'll fix or refund. Warranty = your subscription period.
warranties.disclaimersContent: Service comes 'as is'—no magic guarantees. We're not perfect (shocking, right?). Can't promise zero downtime. Sometimes things break—we'll fix them fast.

limitation.title: Liability Limits (The Lawyer Part)
limitation.liabilityLimitationsContent: We're liable up to 12 months of your payments. No responsibility for indirect damages. Lost profits aren't our problem. These limits stick no matter what.
limitation.excludedDamagesContent: Lost revenue or opportunities. Data loss (back up your stuff!). Having to buy alternative services. Your reputation taking a hit.

indemnification.title: Who Protects Who
indemnification.ourIndemnificationContent: We'll defend against IP infringement claims. We pay if we lose or settle. You need to tell us fast and cooperate. Might modify service instead of paying.
indemnification.yourIndemnificationContent: You defend us if you misuse the service. You defend us over your data issues. You defend us if you break these Terms. You pay if you lose or settle.

termination.title: Breaking Up
termination.terminationByYouContent: Cancel anytime with 30 days' notice. Effective at billing period end. Pay what you owe first. Export your data within 30 days.
termination.terminationByUsContent: We can terminate for breaking Terms. Non-payment = 30 days then bye. Security threats = instant termination. We'll warn you when possible.

governingLaw.title: Legal Jurisdiction Stuff
governingLaw.governingLawContent: California law runs the show. Federal law where applicable. International users follow local laws too. No confusing conflict rules.
governingLaw.disputeResolutionContent: Arbitration, not court battles. AAA rules in San Francisco. No class actions allowed. Keeps lawyers from getting rich.
